description: Episode of Series "Social Psychology". One of a series of a third level course from the Faculty of Social Science, Open University. The purpose is to provide insight into social behaviour and experience focussing on theories, findings and methods of social psychology. In this episode Norman Leighton, a young artist who grew up in the East End of London, talks about his youth and his art.
